title: My Account was hacked
body: Today I logged on and found my account was hacked all my ip looted my friends list cleared out and user name was changed any ideas how I can get this back. the smart person then transferred skins by gifting to the account ||EFX|| can you look into this and return my status to pre 19.03.15?

replies.body: The quicker you make that ticket the better. Strange, though, how they were able to transfer skins. I thought they were untransferable. Are you sure you didn't just log into someone else's account by miraculous mistake?

you will need to raise a support ticket. 
[Here](https://support.leagueoflegends.com/requests/new)
